summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Drainage and Wastewater Utility; amending Section 21.33.030 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Section 2 of Ordinance 114898) to extend the duration of existing drainage rates through December 31, 1992, and adjusting Drainage and Wastewater Utility credits and amending Section 21.76.040 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Section 4 of Ordinance 104472), as of January 1, 1991.
